query: "What is my current percentile for body mass index compared to others of the same age and sex?"
resource_summaries:
This record is an Observation of a patient's Body Mass Index (BMI) taken on April 18, 2021, with a value of 14.45 kg/m2.
This record is an Observation of a pediatric patient's Body Mass Index (BMI) percentile based on age and sex, taken on February 28, 2021, during an encounter.
answer: Your current percentile for body mass index compared to others of the same age and sex is 14.45 kg/m2.
